title: CONCERT: Carleton University Choirs
details: Carleton University Choral ensembles' end of year concert. Event open to University community and by invitation

title: SEMINAR: Musicology in Progress
details: Presentation of Research on Latin American Baroque Choral Music within the Musicology in Progress Colloquium at the University of Cremona in Italy

title: CONCERT: Coro Vivo sings Broadway
details: Coro Vivo Ottawa performs popular works from Broadway Musicals. Progam includes pieces by Andrew Lloyd Webber, Elton John, Marvin Hamlisch and others. Join ust at the Shenkman Arts Centre

title: SEMINAR: Congrès Dialogues 2023/Dialogues Conference 2023
details: Presentation of Research on applied technologies in choral music pedagogy within the Congrès Dialogues 2023/Dialogues Conference 2023 at Laval University

title: WORKSHOP: Mexico - Various Choral Workshops
details: Various Choral workshops in Mexico City, Tlaxcala and other locations. Areas of interest include choral repertoire for chindren ensembles, repertoire for youth choirs and workshops for conducting students and educators
